H0.text: The cocktail called a Tom Collins consists of lemon or lime juice, sugar, soda water and what else. Rum

H1.text: The cocktail called a Tom Collins consists of lemon or lime juice, sugar, soda water and what else. Vodka

H2.text: The cocktail called a Tom Collins consists of lemon or lime juice, sugar, soda water and what else. Whiskey

H3.text: The cocktail called a Tom Collins consists of lemon or lime juice, sugar, soda water and what else. GIN

A4.text: The Tom Collins is a Collins cocktail made from gin, lemon juice, sugar, and carbonated water.

A5.text: The Rum Collins, also called a Ron Collins, uses light rum in place of gin and lime juice in place of lemon juice.
